languages.text: Охрана еле сдерживает толпу бедняков, в экстазе рвущихся к чану со слизнеплесенью, которую отведал{mf||а} сам{mf||а} Лорд-капитан.

The guards can barely keep the throng of paupers at bay. Having observed their Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} taste the soup, the people are now ecstatically pushing their way to the vat of mouldslime.
languages.original_text: Охрана еле сдерживает толпу бедняков, в экстазе рвущихся к чану со слизнеплесенью, которую отведал{mf||а} сам{mf||а} Лорд-капитан.

traits.locale_text: The guards can barely keep the crowd of paupers at bay — the people are ecstatically pushing their way to the vat with mouldslime after the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tasted the soup.
The guards can barely keep the crowd of paupers at bay — the people are ecstatically pushing their way to the vat with mouldslime after the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has tasted the soup.

The guards can barely keep the throng of paupers at bay. Having observed their Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} taste the soup, the people are now ecstatically pushing their way to the vat of mouldslime.

languages.text: Los guardias apenas consiguen mantener a raya a la muchedumbre de pobres. Tras ver a su Lord Capitán probar personalmente la sopa, la gente está empujando con devoción para llegar hasta la cuba de limoho.
languages.original_text: The guards can barely keep the throng of paupers at bay. Having observed their Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} taste the soup, the people are now ecstatically pushing their way to the vat of mouldslime.

traits.locale_text: Los guardias apenas consiguen mantener a raya a la muchedumbre de pobres. Tras ver a su Lord Capitán probar personalmente la sopa, la gente está empujando con devoción para llegar hasta la cuba de limoho.

languages.text: 衛兵たちは、貧民の群れを抑えるのがやっとだ。ロード・キャプテンがスープを味わうのを見た人々は、恍惚とした表情でスライムの桶に向かっていく。
languages.original_text: The guards can barely keep the throng of paupers at bay. Having observed their Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} taste the soup, the people are now ecstatically pushing their way to the vat of mouldslime.

traits.locale_text: 衛兵たちは、貧民の群れを抑えるのがやっとだ。ロード・キャプテンがスープを味わうのを見た人々は、恍惚とした表情でスライムの桶に向かっていく。

languages.text: 守卫几乎根本根本挡不住汹涌而来的船员。人们亲眼见证了行商浪人喝汤的情形，欣喜若狂地涌向满是霉斑的大缸。
languages.original_text: The guards can barely keep the throng of paupers at bay. Having observed their Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} taste the soup, the people are now ecstatically pushing their way to the vat of mouldslime.

traits.locale_text: 守卫几乎根本根本挡不住汹涌而来的船员。人们亲眼见证了行商浪人喝汤的情形，欣喜若狂地涌向满是霉斑的大缸。

languages.text: Die Wachen können den Pulk der Armen kaum auf Distanz halten. Nachdem ihr Lord Captain persönlich von der Suppe probiert hat, drängen die Leute jetzt wie im Rausch zu dem Fass mit Schimmelschleim.
languages.original_text: The guards can barely keep the throng of paupers at bay. Having observed their Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} taste the soup, the people are now ecstatically pushing their way to the vat of mouldslime.

traits.locale_text: Die Wachen können den Pulk der Armen kaum auf Distanz halten. Nachdem ihr Lord Captain persönlich von der Suppe probiert hat, drängen die Leute jetzt wie im Rausch zu dem Fass mit Schimmelschleim.

languages.text: Les gardes ont toutes les peines du monde à contenir l'afflux de démunis. Après avoir vu {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} en personne goûter la soupe, les gens se pressent pour accéder à la cuve de moisissure.
languages.original_text: The guards can barely keep the throng of paupers at bay. Having observed their Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} taste the soup, the people are now ecstatically pushing their way to the vat of mouldslime.

traits.locale_text: Les gardes ont toutes les peines du monde à contenir l'afflux de démunis. Après avoir vu {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} en personne goûter la soupe, les gens se pressent pour accéder à la cuve de moisissure.

languages.text: Muhafızlar, sefil güruhu zar zor uzak tutabiliyor. Lord Kaptan'ın bizzat çorbanın tadına bakmasını gözlemleyen insanlar, şimdi önlerine geleni ezip geçerek coşkuyla küf balçığı tankına doğru ilerliyor.
languages.original_text: The guards can barely keep the throng of paupers at bay. Having observed their Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} taste the soup, the people are now ecstatically pushing their way to the vat of mouldslime.
